item.title: [KAFKA-19131] Exception thrown while updating the RemoteLogReader threads
item.description:
RemoteLogManager throws error when increasing the thread count for remote reads. 

Command:

% sh kafka-configs.sh --bootstrap-server localhost:9092 --broker-defaults --add-config remote.log.reader.threads=15 --alter
Completed updating default config for brokers in the cluster.
